dcterms:creator: Jeffrey Dalton
Chenyan Xiong
Vaibhav Kumar
Jamie Callan
dcterms:description: The TREC Conversational Assistance Track (CAsT) 2019 benchmark provides a series of dialogues for conversational search, including manually curated queries that mimic real dialogues with common natural language characteristics.
dcterms:title: TREC CAsT 2019

dcterms:creator: Jeffrey Dalton
Chenyan Xiong
dcterms:description: CAsT 2020 is the dataset for the second year of the Conversational Assistance Track, containing evaluation dialogues that refer to previous answers, making it more realistic.
dcterms:title: TREC CAsT 2020

dcterms:creator: Chen Qu
Liu Yang
Cen Chen
Minghui Qiu
W. Bruce Croft
Mohit Iyyer
dcterms:description: OR-QuAC is a large-scale synthetic conversational retrieval dataset built on the QuAC dataset, designed for open-retrieval conversational question answering.
dcterms:title: OR-QuAC

dcterms:creator: Eunsol Choi
He He
Mohit Iyyer
Mark Yatskar
Wen Tau Yih
Yejin Choi
Percy Liang
Luke Zettlemoyer
dcterms:description: QuAC is a dataset where crowd-source workers ask multi-turn questions about a given Wikipedia entity and its description, designed for question answering in context.
dcterms:title: QuAC
